leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算化学-量化计算与工作流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 求解→批量运行→解析/后处理→验证→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 求解器 + 工作流/调度 + 解析器

unit.unit_name: 输入生成/参数化/批量运行工作流

queries: [WEB] high throughput materials calculation python github
[WEB] vasp gaussian input generation library github
[WEB] python hpc job manager chemistry github

tools.name: mof_screen
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput DFT screening workflow for MOFs using ASE and VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed for high-throughput Density Functional Theory (DFT) screening of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs). It utilizes the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) and VASP to automate the calculation processes for material discovery.

tools.name: xtb_ase
tools.one_line_profile: ASE calculator interface for the xTB semi-empirical quantum chemistry code
tools.detailed_description: A fully featured Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) calculator for the Extended Tight-Binding (xTB) program package. It enables users to perform semi-empirical quantum chemical calculations within the ASE ecosystem.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for GROMACS molecular dynamics software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with GROMACS, enabling automated and reproducible molecular dynamics simulations and data provenance tracking.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO input/output files
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the pymatgen library designed to parse and generate input/output files for the Quantum ESPRESSO electronic structure code, facilitating interoperability and analysis.

tools.name: strucscan
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for high-throughput material simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework developed by ICAMS for managing high-throughput material simulations, focusing on structure generation and scanning workflows.

tools.name: ChemFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Chemistry Workflow management system
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for constructing and managing computational chemistry workflows, facilitating the automation of complex simulation tasks.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that supports the FLEUR code (all-electron DFT), enabling high-throughput electronic structure calculations and provenance tracking.

tools.name: aiida-jutools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility tools for AiiDA workflows in computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper tools and utilities to simplify the daily usage of the AiiDA workflow engine, specifically tailored for the JuDFT team's plugins and workflows.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR KKR-GF code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine interfacing with the JuKKR code (Korringa-Kohn-Rostoker Green Function method) for high-throughput electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: Atomate2 workflows for LAMMPS molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for the atomate2 workflow engine that provides pre-defined workflows and firetasks for running LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: QCManyBody
tools.one_line_profile: Intermolecular many-body expansion calculator with QCArchive integration
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing many-body expansion (MBE) calculations, designed to integrate seamlessly with the QCArchive infrastructure for handling quantum chemistry data.

tools.name: QCPortal
tools.one_line_profile: Client interface for the QCArchive quantum chemistry database
tools.detailed_description: The primary client library for interacting with QCArchive instances (such as QCFractal), allowing users to submit calculations, query results, and manage datasets in a distributed quantum chemistry ecosystem.

tools.name: maize
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based workflow manager for computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A workflow manager that allows users to define computational chemistry pipelines as graphs, facilitating the automation of complex simulation tasks and data flow between different chemistry software.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for deep learning on molecules and crystals
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end differentiable models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen for input processing.

tools.name: ALCHEMI Toolkit-Ops
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized kernels for accelerating chemistry and materials workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of optimized batch kernels and operations designed to accelerate computational chemistry and materials science simulations, particularly on NVIDIA hardware.

tools.name: ScalableWorkflow_VASP_Calculations
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating VASP inputs for alloy solid solutions
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow tool developed at ORNL to generate VASP input files with randomized atomic structures for binary and ternary solid solution alloys across compositional ranges.

tools.name: Parsl
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel scripting library for scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based parallel scripting library that enables the execution of data-oriented workflows on diverse computing resources, widely used in scientific computing for managing complex pipelines.

tools.name: DFTTK
tools.one_line_profile: Automated VASP workflows for thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for automating Density Functional Theory (DFT) workflows using VASP, with a focus on finite temperature thermodynamics and result storage in MongoDB.

tools.name: xtb-mcp-server
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for XTB quantum chemistry automation
tools.detailed_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that interfaces AI assistants with the Extended Tight-Binding (XTB) program to automate the generation of input files and execution of quantum chemistry workflows.

tools.name: FireCore
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation environment for on-surface chemistry and SPM
tools.detailed_description: An integrated simulation environment combining GPU-accelerated classical mechanics and DFT for high-throughput screening of molecular configurations on surfaces and scanning-probe microscopy simulations.

tools.name: quacc
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for computational materials science and quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A flexible platform built for the big data era of computational materials science, providing a library of recipes to construct complex workflows for various quantum chemistry codes.

tools.name: raspa_ase
tools.one_line_profile: ASE interface for RASPA2
tools.detailed_description: A calculator interface connecting the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) with RASPA2, enabling the use of RASPA's Monte Carlo simulation capabilities within ASE workflows.

tools.name: qmflows
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computational chemistry workflow execution
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the construction and efficient execution of computational chemistry workflows, handling input generation and job management for various quantum chemistry packages.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating defect structures in materials by employing chemically-guided bond distortions to escape local minima and find the ground state structure of defects.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for the generation, pre-processing, and post-processing analysis of defect supercell calculations in materials science, streamlining the defect simulation workflow.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for surface slab generation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating and analyzing slab structures for first-principles calculations of surfaces, automating the creation of surface models from bulk structures.

tools.name: VASP-DOS_extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Script to extract DOS from VASP outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based Python script designed to extract density of states (DOS) and projected DOS data from VASP `vasprun.xml` files for analysis.

tools.name: VASP-Structural_Descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Script for collecting structural descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based script to calculate and collect structural descriptors from atomic structures, useful for materials analysis and machine learning datasets.

tools.name: VASPIN_GEN
tools.one_line_profile: VASP input file generator script
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to automatically generate standard VASP input files (INCAR, KPOINTS, POTCAR, job scripts) for computational chemistry calculations.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CHAMP code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that enables the management and execution of calculations using the CHAMP (Quantum Monte Carlo) software package.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with Quantum Package 2.0, facilitating automated quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: An MCP-compatible server that provides atomistic simulation capabilities to AI agents by wrapping tools like ASE and Pymatgen, enabling LLM-driven materials science workflows.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for VASP calculations with Custodian error handling
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the VASP quantum chemistry code, incorporating Custodian for automated error correction and job management.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for phonon calculations using Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: Enables automated phonon calculations within the AiiDA framework by interfacing with the Phonopy code, supporting pre-processing and post-processing of phonon data.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: Automated active learning workflow for neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow that implements a fully automated active learning scheme to train neural network interatomic potentials.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Official AiiDA plugin for VASP simulations
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface for running Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) calculations within the AiiDA workflow engine, managing inputs, outputs, and provenance.

tools.name: aiidalab
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for computational science workflows
tools.detailed_description: Implements core functions for AiiDAlab, a web-based platform that allows users to run and manage AiiDA workflows through a graphical interface.

tools.name: aiidalab-qe
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: A graphical application running on AiiDAlab to facilitate the preparation, submission, and analysis of Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-widgets-base
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable UI widgets for AiiDAlab applications
tools.detailed_description: A collection of reusable Jupyter widgets designed for building scientific applications within the AiiDAlab ecosystem, facilitating structure visualization and parameter input.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE)
tools.detailed_description: Allows the use of ASE calculators and tools within AiiDA workflows, bridging the gap between AiiDA's provenance engine and ASE's atomistic simulation capabilities.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface AiiDA with the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code, supporting various potential types and calculation protocols.

tools.name: acwf-verification-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for AiiDA common workflows verification
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts used to run and analyze data for the verification of AiiDA common workflows, ensuring consistency across different quantum codes.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common interfaces for materials science workflows in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: Implements standardized workflow interfaces (protocols) across different simulation codes (Quantum ESPRESSO, VASP, etc.) to facilitate cross-code comparison and interoperability.

tools.name: aiida-core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science
tools.detailed_description: The core engine of AiiDA, an open-source platform for managing, preserving, and disseminating the simulations, data, and workflows of modern computational science.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CP2K
tools.detailed_description: Enables the execution of CP2K calculations within the AiiDA framework, supporting various atomistic simulation methods provided by CP2K.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for calculating Hubbard parameters
tools.detailed_description: Provides AiiDA workflows to calculate self-consistent onsite and intersite Hubbard U and V parameters from first-principles using linear response theory.

tools.name: aiida-hyperqueue
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA scheduler plugin for HyperQueue
tools.detailed_description: Allows AiiDA to submit jobs to the HyperQueue metascheduler, enabling efficient task scheduling on HPC clusters.

tools.name: aiida-project
tools.one_line_profile: Project management tool for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to manage AiiDA projects, facilitating the organization and switching between different research contexts.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: Official AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: The official plugin to interface AiiDA with the Quantum ESPRESSO suite, supporting PWscf, PHonon, CP, and other codes for materials simulation.

tools.name: aiida-restapi
tools.one_line_profile: REST API for AiiDA data access
tools.detailed_description: Provides a RESTful API to query and retrieve data, provenance, and calculation results stored in the AiiDA database, enabling programmatic access to scientific data.

tools.name: aiida-shell
tools.one_line_profile: Run arbitrary shell commands in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that allows users to run any shell command or script as an AiiDA process, automatically capturing provenance without writing a full plugin.

tools.name: aiida-submission-controller
tools.one_line_profile: Controller for high-throughput AiiDA submissions
tools.detailed_description: Provides classes to manage large numbers of job submissions in AiiDA, controlling the maximum number of concurrent runs to optimize resource usage.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Wannier90
tools.detailed_description: Interfaces AiiDA with the Wannier90 code for calculating maximally localized Wannier functions and related properties.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflows for Wannier90 in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A collection of advanced, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions using AiiDA and Wannier90, handling the complex parameterization required.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive workflow design for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: Allows users to design and manage flexible AiiDA workflows using a graph-based approach, featuring an interactive GUI and checkpointing capabilities.

tools.name: plumpy
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow library for stateful processes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that supports writing stateful processes with defined inputs and outputs, serving as the underlying workflow logic engine for AiiDA.

tools.name: ChemGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Agentic framework for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: An agentic framework designed to automate computational chemistry and materials science workflows, leveraging LLMs or agents to manage simulation tasks.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated IR and Raman spectroscopy workflows
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA package for the automated calculation of vibrational properties, including infrared and Raman spectra, using various functionals.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality atom and molecule rendering with Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces with Blender to create high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atoms, molecules, and crystal structures.

tools.name: parsl-dag-vis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Parsl workflow dependency graphs in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A visualization utility that renders Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs) of Parsl workflows directly within Jupyter notebooks, aiding in the monitoring and debugging of parallel scientific workflows.

tools.name: crawfish
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen-compatible utility for VASP output plotting
tools.detailed_description: A rewrite of the ultrasoftcrawfish tool designed to work with pymatgen, providing functionality to plot and analyze VASP calculation outputs such as Density of States (DOS) and band structures.

tools.name: SgsAnnDataV2
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for single-cell analysis objects to AnnData format
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics package used to convert analysis objects from various single-cell frameworks (Seurat, Giotto, Signac, ArchR) into the AnnData format, facilitating interoperability in single-cell genomics workflows.

tools.name: signac (BioTuring)
tools.one_line_profile: Analytics package for single-cell data processing
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation/library for single-cell data analytics, likely associated with BioTuring's ecosystem for high-performance processing of genomic data.

tools.name: parsli
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for geophysical modeling results
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for visualizing results from 'celeri' (interseismic deformation) and 'skies' (earthquake sequences) modeling codes, used in geophysics and earthquake science.

tools.name: libavogadro1cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: CP2K input generator and output visualizer for Avogadro
tools.detailed_description: A plugin/library for the Avogadro molecular editor that enables the generation of input files for the CP2K quantum chemistry package and the visualization of its outputs.

tools.name: ASEMTP
tools.one_line_profile: ASE calculator interface for Moment Tensor Potentials (MTP)
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface connecting the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) with Moment Tensor Potentials (MTP), enabling machine learning force field calculations within ASE workflows.

tools.name: parsley (3D Scanner)
tools.one_line_profile: Software for low-cost laser triangulation 3D scanning
tools.detailed_description: A C# application for controlling a low-cost 3D scanner based on laser triangulation, used for generating 3D point cloud data from physical objects.

tools.name: ai2-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for AI-enhanced ab initio computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit designed to integrate artificial intelligence with ab initio methods for computational chemistry, facilitating automated workflows and enhanced simulation capabilities.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced visualization for ASE/Pymatgen structures in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A library providing highly configurable 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) visualizations for atomic structures handled by ASE and Pymatgen, specifically designed for use within Jupyter Notebooks.

tools.name: planckton
tools.one_line_profile: MD workflow for organic photovoltaic morphology self-assembly
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible workflow tool for exploring the self-assembly of organic photovoltaic morphologies using molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Lammps-Data-File-Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for LAMMPS data files from POSCAR inputs
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility that generates LAMMPS data files using force field information and VASP POSCAR-like input files, facilitating the setup of molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: CalcUS
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for quantum chemistry calculations
tools.detailed_description: A web platform designed to facilitate quantum chemistry calculations, providing an interface for setting up, running, and analyzing simulations.

tools.name: deepmd-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package that generates accurate many-body potential energy surfaces and force fields for molecular dynamics simulations, bridging the gap between ab initio accuracy and classical MD efficiency.

tools.name: dftbplus-ase
tools.one_line_profile: ASE calculator interface for DFTB+
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface that allows the DFTB+ (Density Functional Tight Binding) software to be used as a calculator within the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE).

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction (D4)
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the D4 London dispersion correction model, which provides generally applicable atomic-charge dependent dispersion corrections for density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: auto-qchem
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for DFT calculations of organic molecules
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool designed for the generation, management, and storage of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations specifically for organic molecules.

tools.name: parsleyapp
tools.one_line_profile: Data parsing tool for plate reader export files
tools.detailed_description: An R package for parsing, extracting, tidying, and joining metadata with export files from laboratory plate readers, streamlining data processing in experimental biology/chemistry.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automating point defect calculations in materials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that provides automated workflows for calculating point defects in materials, handling supercell generation and charge state corrections.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the ORCA quantum chemistry software, enabling the automation of ORCA calculations and management of input/output data within the AiiDA provenance graph.

tools.name: ASE_VASP_automation
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for automating VASP DFT workflows using ASE
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts utilizing the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) to automate Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations with VASP, facilitating high-throughput screening.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure visualization tool using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for plotting electronic band structures with atomic or orbital contributions projected onto a color scale, built on top of pymatgen.

tools.name: signac
tools.one_line_profile: Data management framework for computational science
tools.detailed_description: A framework to manage large and heterogeneous data spaces on the file system, specifically designed for computational science workflows (MD, MC simulations) to track parameters and state points.

tools.name: signac-dashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Web dashboard for visualizing signac data spaces
tools.detailed_description: A visualization interface for the signac framework, allowing users to search, browse, and plot data from their signac-managed scientific projects.

tools.name: signac-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management for signac projects
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the signac framework that manages the submission and execution of data-dependent workflows on high-performance computing (HPC) clusters.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library of pre-defined workflows for computational materials science, built on top of Pymatgen, FireWorks, and Custodian, enabling high-throughput DFT calculations.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit based on Pymatgen for processing materials simulation data, likely focused on specific analysis tasks within the developer's research group context.

tools.name: hzdplugins
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for AiiDA structure construction and viewing
tools.detailed_description: A plugin toolbox for AiiDA that assists in constructing initial structures for simulations and viewing them, facilitating the setup phase of computational workflows.

tools.name: pyemto
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for EMTO-DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to facilitate the setup, execution, and management of Exact Muffin-Tin Orbitals (EMTO) Density Functional Theory calculations.

tools.name: httk
tools.one_line_profile: High-Throughput Toolkit for materials calculations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for preparing and running high-throughput calculations, analyzing results, and managing data in global or personalized databases.

tools.name: compchem_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for AiiDA, Pymatgen, and VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python utilities designed to speed up input setup and output analysis for computational chemistry workflows involving AiiDA and VASP.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ASE interface for ANI neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface that allows the use of ANI (ANAKIN-ME) neural network potentials within the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) for molecular dynamics and optimization.

tools.name: aiidalab-ispg
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA Lab application for UV/vis spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA Lab application (ATMOSPEC) designed to make ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy calculations accessible via a user-friendly web interface.

tools.name: vasp (jkitchin)
tools.one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) compliant interface to the VASP density functional theory code, facilitating input generation and calculation management.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper tools for working with structure graphs in pymatgen, facilitating the analysis of crystal structures and connectivity.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for hybrid organic-inorganic perovskite structures
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for nanoscale atomic scenes for S/TEM simulation
tools.detailed_description: Modules for generating nanoscale atomic scenes and structures, primarily designed for use with pymatgen and S/TEM image simulation workflows.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for LSMO laboratory research
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and plugins developed for the LSMO laboratory, facilitating specific computational chemistry and materials science tasks.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA molecular dynamics code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with RASPA, a software package for simulating adsorption and diffusion of molecules in flexible nanoporous materials.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++ porous materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with Zeo++, a software package for performing geometry-based analysis of porous materials.

tools.name: aiida-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based provenance browser for AiiDA databases
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web application to explore AiiDA databases, allowing users to visualize and navigate the provenance graph of computational materials science calculations.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow infrastructure for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: The specific workflow implementation used by the Materials Project, merging pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to manage high-throughput materials computations.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Library of computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A library of computational materials science workflows, serving as a successor to Atomate, designed to run complex calculations using Jobflow and FireWorks.

tools.name: custodian
tools.one_line_profile: Just-in-time job management and error correction framework
tools.detailed_description: A simple, robust, and flexible just-in-time job management framework in Python, primarily used for error correction in high-throughput materials science calculations (e.g., VASP).

tools.name: FireWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for high-throughput computing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system designed for running high-throughput calculations at supercomputing centers, supporting dynamic workflows and provenance tracking.

tools.name: mpmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, leveraging pymatgen, custodian, and fireworks.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Python Materials Genomics library for materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: A robust open-source Python library for materials analysis, defining core classes for structures and molecules, and supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and functions specifically for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized add-on for pymatgen to model and analyze point defects in materials, including thermodynamics and electronic structure properties.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project style data
tools.detailed_description: An addon to pymatgen that facilitates the creation and management of MongoDB databases for storing materials data and calculation results in the Materials Project format.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for VASP calculations compatibility with Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validation tool designed to ensure that VASP calculation inputs and outputs are compatible with the Materials Project database standards. It serves as a quality control layer for high-throughput density functional theory (DFT) workflows.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for analyzing diffusion in materials
tools.detailed_description: An extension module for the pymatgen library specifically designed to analyze diffusion pathways and properties in materials, likely using Nugged Elastic Band (NEB) or molecular dynamics (MD) trajectory data.

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automatic active space selection in multireference calculations
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that automates the selection of active spaces for multireference quantum chemical calculations, streamlining complex electronic structure workflows.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for defining dynamic workflows using Python functions
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the AiiDA workflow engine that allows researchers to define dynamic, flexible workflows using standard Python functions, enhancing the programmability of scientific pipelines.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF quantum chemistry framework
tools.detailed_description: A plugin integrating the PySCF (Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework) into the AiiDA ecosystem, enabling provenance tracking and workflow management for PySCF calculations.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal structure viewer using fresnel and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for crystal structures that leverages pymatgen for data handling and fresnel for high-quality rendering, aiding in the visual inspection of materials.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: An interface connecting the Gaussian quantum chemistry package with AiiDA, allowing for the automation, management, and provenance tracking of Gaussian calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for on-surface chemistry simulations
tools.detailed_description: A specialized application within the AiiDAlab platform focused on simulating on-surface chemistry, providing a graphical interface and workflows for surface science research.

tools.name: multiple_minimum_monte_carlo
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Minimum Monte Carlo conformer search tool using ASE
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing conformer searches using the Multiple Minimum Monte Carlo (M3C) method. It integrates with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) to utilize various calculators for energy evaluation.

tools.name: openforcefield-forcebalance
tools.one_line_profile: Force field parameter optimization using ForceBalance and QCArchive
tools.detailed_description: A tool for optimizing molecular mechanics force field parameters against quantum chemical data, specifically tailored for the Open Force Field initiative's workflows.

tools.name: qca-dataset-submission
tools.one_line_profile: Data generation and submission scripts for QCArchive
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and notebooks for generating quantum chemistry datasets and submitting them to the QCArchive ecosystem, facilitating large-scale data management.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen IO module for OpenMM simulation setup
tools.detailed_description: A bridge library that enables the setup of OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations using pymatgen's data structures, facilitating interoperability between materials analysis and MD simulation tools.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for plotting electronic band structures and DOS
tools.detailed_description: An interactive Jupyter widget designed for visualizing electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) in computational materials science notebooks.

tools.name: hotbit
tools.one_line_profile: ASE calculator for density-functional tight-binding (DFTB) calculations
tools.detailed_description: A calculator interface for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) that implements density-functional tight-binding (DFTB) methods, enabling efficient semi-empirical quantum mechanical calculations.

tools.name: DFTtoolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for building inputs and analyzing DFT results
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed to streamline the generation of input files and the analysis of output results for Density Functional Theory (DFT) codes, enhancing productivity in computational materials science.

tools.name: ichor
tools.one_line_profile: Data management library for machine learning force field development
tools.detailed_description: A library focused on the management and processing of computational chemistry data specifically for the purpose of developing and training machine learning force fields.

tools.name: wxDragon-DFT-Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Automated DFT input file generator using wxDragon
tools.detailed_description: A tool or script leveraging the wxDragon interface to automate the generation of input files for Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, simplifying the setup process for researchers.

tools.name: executorlib
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance computing execution library for Python functions
tools.detailed_description: A library within the pyiron ecosystem designed to scale up Python function execution for High-Performance Computing (HPC) environments, managing job submission and resource allocation.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework and IDE for computational materials science that integrates various simulation codes, manages complex workflows, and handles data provenance and storage.

tools.name: python-workflow-definition
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow interoperability definitions for AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A project aiming to define standard Python workflow interfaces to enable interoperability between major computational materials science workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active-learning workflow for building ML interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A specialized workflow built on atomate2 and jobflow that autonomously constructs machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) for various material classes using active learning strategies.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for solving Slater-Koster tight-binding Hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package designed to solve Slater-Koster tight-binding topological Hamiltonians, useful for electronic structure calculations in condensed matter physics.

tools.name: aiida-siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the SIESTA DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the SIESTA density functional theory code, enabling automated high-throughput electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: g-xtb-ase
tools.one_line_profile: ASE calculator wrapper for the g-xTB semi-empirical code
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that allows the g-xTB (extended tight-binding) code to be used as a calculator within the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), facilitating molecular dynamics and geometry optimization.

tools.name: ChemRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Automated manager for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: An automated and interoperable manager designed to handle computational chemistry workflows, aiming to streamline the execution and management of simulation tasks.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that integrates machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) into automated workflows, developed by STFC.

tools.name: Signac
tools.one_line_profile: R toolkit for single-cell chromatin data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for the analysis of single-cell chromatin accessibility data (scATAC-seq), providing tools for dimensionality reduction, clustering, and visualization.

tools.name: avogadrolibs-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: CP2K input generator extension for Avogadro 2
tools.detailed_description: A plugin/extension for the Avogadro 2 molecular editor that generates input files for the CP2K quantum chemistry software package.

tools.name: ArchRtoSignac
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from ArchR projects to Signac objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package that facilitates the conversion of single-cell data objects from ArchR format to Signac (Seurat) format, enabling interoperability between bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for high-throughput workflows
tools.detailed_description: The MAterials Simulation Toolkit (MAST) is a python tool designed to manage and automate computational materials science workflows, built to work with pymatgen.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Yambo MBPT code
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA plugin to automate Many-Body Perturbation Theory calculations (GW, BSE) using the Yambo code, managing the complex workflow of input generation and execution.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for plotting ternary phase diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Python package for creating ternary diagrams, commonly used in materials science and chemistry for visualizing phase compositions, without requiring heavy dependencies like pymatgen.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CASTEP DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that provides an interface to the CASTEP software, enabling automated density functional theory calculations and provenance tracking.
